name: Wordle Plus
description:
So,  What's the Plus?
  • Self-contained Windows program.  Internet is not required.
  • Session play.  Play as many games as you like, creating a session score.
  • A space bar and a Vis Button have been added to aid in visualizing partial words.
  • Includes an optional Redo Mode.  When your first guess contains no matching letters you get to replay the guess.
  • Game performance is both scored and averaged. Scoring better reflects your performance.
  • Lifetime stats are retained, but an option exists to reset this data.
  • Optional subtle gameplay guidance is available to assist those that are new to the game.
